headlines.description: Three second-half goals ensured Manchester City climbed back into second in the Premier League after a 3-0 victory over Aston Villa.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City see off Aston Villa to go second

headlines.description: Defender Lucas Digne's stoppage time completed a superb comeback by Brighton to give them a thrilling 3-2 win over Everton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Late Digne own goal gives Brighton 3-2 win over Everton

headlines.description: Watford's winless run since the start of the Premier League campaign stretched to 10 games when they played out a 0-0 draw against Bournemouth.
headlines.shortLinkText: Watford's winless run in Prem goes to 10 games

events.name: Sheffield United at West Ham United

headlines.description: Lys Mousset's second goal in as many games earned Sheffield United a 1-1 draw at West Ham on Saturday, sending the newly-promoted side seventh.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sheffield Utd go seventh after draw at West Ham

headlines.description: Christian Pulisic scored a perfect hat trick for his first Premier League goals to lead Chelsea to a runaway 4-2 win over Burnley on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Perfect Pulisic hat trick leads Chelsea past Burnley
